--- title: "System Call Tracer for Windows" layout: default permalink: /page_drstrace.html ---
DynamoRIO
System Call Tracer for Windows

drstrace is a system call tracing tool for Windows. It is part of the Dr. Memory tool suite. It is also included with DynamoRIO versions 5.0.0 and higher.

If this documentation is part of a DynamoRIO public release, this link should point at the local documentation provided with the release package. This one points to the online documentation.
